skills.title: Python
skills.description: I possess advanced proficiency in Python, demonstrated by my successful completion of my computer science A-level coursework and exam using Python, as well as my extensive track record of completed projects in the language. Here's a fun fact: Python happened to be the very first programming language I delved into.

skills.title: Java
skills.description: I have attained a proficient level of expertise in Java, thanks to my strong foundation in object-oriented programming and my successful completion of a group project implementing the board game Scotland Yard, for a first-year university course titled 'Object-Oriented Programming and Algorithms' and recieving a 2:1 in this coursework.

skills.title: Recat JS, HTML & CSS
skills.description: I possess proficient knowledge of React JS, HTML, and CSS, which is evidenced by the successful completion of two projects I've undertaken using these languages: my Chrome extension and this website. Furthermore, I currently have other projects in progress that also leverage these technologies.

skills.title: Algorithms
skills.description: I have a strong command of algorithms, as I have consistently employed them in all of my projects. In addition, I successfully completed the university unit 'Object-Oriented Programming and Algorithms,' where I achieved a 2:1 grade, and I am currently enrolled in an advanced algorithms course titled 'Algorithms II.'

skills.title: Data Structures
skills.description: I possess a strong understanding of data structures, which is underscored by their consistent application in all of my projects. I have delved into the study of algorithms commonly employed with various data structures, and I have even taken the initiative to implement my own data structures, including trees, linked lists, stacks, and queues, in multiple programming languages.

projects.title: Tower Defence Game
projects.description: As a personal passion project, I developed a tower defense game using the open-source game engine Godot, utilizing GDScript, a language that bears a striking resemblance to Python. In the game, you need to defend your home from slime enemies by placing turrets, while budgeting your money carefully. While the game currently features just one level, I have plans to incorporate more levels in the future. If you'd like to give it a try, you can play the game online without the need for downloads by following the link provided on the GitHub repository.

projects.title: Chrome Extension
projects.description: Recently I developed a Google Chrome extension that allows users to customize website text fonts and colors. This project was created using plain JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

projects.title: This Website
projects.description: I developed the website you are currently browsing, crafted with React JS, CSS, and HTML. Building this website was a lot of fun, and it also provided me with valuable insights into React development. I hope you like it!

projects.title: Platformer Game
projects.description: For my A-level coursework, I created a 2D platformer game using Python and the Pygame library. In this game, you take on the role of a small dinosaur, navigating through the levels to collect gems that enhance your character's statistics. Your objective is to defeat enemies and progress to the next level, all while striving to achieve the highest possible score.
